name: LOS CUERVOS
description:
Two pilots meet in the desert,

Two pilots paint the sky awhile in a deadly embrace,

One pilot flies into the sunset...

Made for the Space Cowboy Jam

----

Kenny Backus (@nihilocrat) Programming

Charles Blanchard (@DelkoDuck) Art

Eirik Suhkre (@strotchy) Music

Joonas Turner (@KissaKolme) Sound

----

This is based on the Sky Rogue codebase. Check it out if you want a much more fleshed out singleplayer experience and a slightly more sim-like, less arcadey feel. Or if you want to shoot a zillion missiles at once.
